pod.title: Torchlight Personnel File
pod.content: Apparently William Macintyre, a young Public Relations representative for Torchlight, has been working from home for the past few weeks as he deals with a family emergency abroad. There's a note that his connection tends to be bad, but he still puts in the work... although that might make it harder for you to put in the work, if he's harder to get in contact with due to his poor connection.
pod.summary: William has been diligently working from home while he deals with a family emergency abroad.

pod.title: Personal Email
pod.content:
William's inbox is full of booking confirmations from various low-budget airlines. He's been to Bangkok, Aruba, and Mykonos in the past month alone. His family must be massive for an emergency to span so many continents.

(+)
pod.summary: William has flown to multiple different countries all over the world recently. (+)

pod.title: Work Email
pod.content:
As public relations, William's work is largely to write press releases, which he then emails to his bosses for review... although interestingly, the metadata on all his documents seem to indicate that they were all sent from the same IP address in Oklahoma.

(+)
pod.summary: All of William's work documents that he's been sending in were apparently written in Oklahoma. (+)

pod.title: Personal Phone (VPN)
pod.content:
William is using a VPN, but you get past it and find that he's in Mykonos, Greece. Jacking into the microphone on his device reveals what's definitely the eardrum-shattering bass of a Greek rager. Putting in the work, huh?

(++)
pod.summary: William is currently partying in Greece. (++)

pod.title: Oklahoma IP Address
pod.content:
You trace the IP address to the computer of Shelley Greene, a freelance writer. On her computer you also find records of transactions between her and William - looks like he's been outsourcing all his work to her.

(++)
pod.summary: William has been paying a freelance writer to do all his work for him. (++)

combos.comboSummary: William has been diligently working from home while he deals with an apparently globe-trotting family emergency abroad.
William has been not-so-diligently working from home while he deals with a family emergency abroad.
William has been diligently working from home while he deals with a family emergency abroad, if you consider Oklahoma abroad.
William has been not-so-diligently working from home while he deals with an apparently globe-trotting family emergency abroad.
William has been not-so-diligently working from home while he deals with a family emergency abroad, if you consider Oklahoma abroad.
William has been apparently working from home while he deals with a family emergency abroad, but he's been sending in work from somewhere he's not.
William has been apparently working from home while he deals with a family emergency abroad, but he's been partying and sending in work from somewhere he's not.
William has been paying a freelance writer to do his work for him while he deals with a family emergency abroad.
William has been paying a freelance writer to do his work for him while he parties in Greece.
William has been paying a freelance writer to do his work for him while he deals with an apparently globe-trotting family emergency abroad.
William has been paying a freelance writer to do his work for him while he parties around the world.
